title: Where Gratitude Gets You
description: Many of us struggle with self-control. And we assume willpower is the key to achieving our goals. But there's a simple and often overlooked mental habit that can improve our health and well-being. This week on Hidden Brain, we talk with psychologist David DeSteno about that habit — the practice of gratitude.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
